name: Death Simulator
description:
"Death Simulator - Le jeu de puzzle" is a 3D puzzle game with explosions in which you kill people and they DIE.

Embody the Death, which is actually a very lazy entity. Try to maximize the amount of deaths even though you only have one move to make.

Have fun calculating your move and see the unexpected results!

Team :

Bata - Programmer

Allifeur - Game Design

Hairpay - Level Design / 3D Animator

Nahkriin - 2D/3D Artist

Zebu - Composer / Sound designer

Kallysto - Team manager (Website - LinkedIn)

Kosmos - 3D Artist / Programmer
